meanings.definition: Not under the influence of drugs or alcohol.
meanings.sent1: She felt unstoned after a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent2: He drove unstoned to ensure safety on the road.
meanings.sent3: The party was so boring, she wished she was unstoned for some excitement.
meanings.sent4: His mind was unstoned, clear as a cloudless sky.
meanings.sent5: Being unstoned allowed her to make rational decisions.

meanings.sent1: The unstoned path led through the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The unstoned beach was perfect for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The unstoned garden looked bare without any rocks.
meanings.sent4: The unstoned landscape stretched out endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The unstoned area was smooth and easy to walk on.
